summary: Seasoned and highly versatile IT professional with over 15 years of experience architecting and developing solutions across higher education and private consulting. Possesses deep expertise in full-stack development (React, Vue, .NET) and multi-cloud infrastructure, managing environments in both Microsoft Azure and AWS. Proven ability in cybersecurity, successfully implementing the NIST SP 800-171 framework to secure sensitive data. Adept at translating complex institutional and business needs into scalable, secure, and user-centric technology solutions.

experience.title: IT Consultant
description: Implemented comprehensive cybersecurity controls for clients to achieve compliance with NIST SP 800-171, successfully addressing all 110 security control points for SPRS reporting.
Designed, deployed, and managed secure, scalable WordPress websites for multiple clients using AWS services (EC2, S3, Route 53), ensuring high availability and performance.
Configured, secured, and managed client network infrastructure, including UniFi switches and SonicWall firewalls, to protect against threats, segment traffic, and optimize connectivity.
Provided end-to-end IT strategy and support for small businesses, from hardware procurement to cloud architecture and data security.

experience.title: Senior Full-Stack Developer | Full-Stack Developer | Jr Developer
description: Led the ground-up development of a new student services portal using React and .NET Core, resulting in a 40% improvement in mobile usability.
Spearheaded the migration of three critical on-premise legacy applications to Microsoft Azure, establishing automated CI/CD pipelines with Azure DevOps that reduced deployment times by over 75%.
Engineered and maintained a suite of internal administrative applications, leveraging JavaScript, HTML, and CSS to create intuitive user interfaces that automated key departmental processes.
Developed and maintained departmental websites and web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and .NET.
Collaborated with faculty and staff to gather requirements and deliver technical solutions.
Automated data reporting tasks, reducing manual effort by 30%.

experience.title: Desktop Support Assistant
description: Provided front-line technical support for hardware and software issues to over 500 faculty and staff members.
Achieved a 95% user satisfaction rating through timely and effective problem resolution.
Developed a passion for programming by creating scripts to automate routine support tasks.
